quoteLast: by the clock, Guest appeared in the doorway of the hotel, made an inquiry of the porter, and was directed to Cornelia's sheltered seat.  She saw him cast a glance over her neat, walking costume, as he approached, and naughtily determined to prolong his uncertainty.
